title: New: Darling Din – Killing To Be Bright
body:
**Killing To Be Bright** has kept me company through August so far, giving the hottest month of the summer that special melancholic touch during.

Brooklyn based trio [**Darling Din**](http://www.facebook.com/darlingdin) give off a dynamic psyched dream pop aura in a way not too dissimilar to Wye Oak, placing this freshly surfaced indie band amongst my favourite emerging acts of the past few months.
